additionalIdentifier.subject: MY.additionalIdentifier
additionalIdentifier.title: Identifier of this dataset/collection in other databases

citation.subject: MY.citation
citation.description: Example how to cite this collection in a scientific article, if using organization, name and abbreviation is not enough.
citation.title: Citation recommendation

contactEmail.subject: MY.contactEmail
contactEmail.description: Personal or general (e.g. group of people in the organisation) email address to reach the person(s) responsible.
contactEmail.title: Contact email

coverageBasis.subject: MY.coverageBasis
coverageBasis.description: Concise definition of the coverage, if not clear from name or description. For example, 'Winter birds of Finland'.
coverageBasis.title: Coverage basis

description.subject: MY.description
description.description: Free-form description of the collection in different languages.
description.title: Description

gbifDoi.subject: MY.gbifDoi
gbifDoi.description: Admin field. DOI received from GBIF after the collection has been published.
gbifDoi.title: Collection DOI from GBIF

geographicCoverage.subject: MY.geographicCoverage
geographicCoverage.description: Smallest common geographical area for the specimens/data in the collection (for example, country or continent name).
geographicCoverage.title: Geographic coverage

institutionCode.subject: MY.institutionCode
institutionCode.description: Institution code for natural history specimen collection holding institution, such as H, MHZ or TUR
institutionCode.title: Institution code

intellectualOwner.subject: MY.intellectualOwner
intellectualOwner.description: Name of the institution or organisation publishing the data.
intellectualOwner.title: Publisher name (en)

methods.subject: MY.methods
methods.description: Methods used when creating this collection, if they are standardized. Includes information on items such as census methods, tools, instrument calibration and software.
methods.title: Methods

personResponsible.subject: MY.personResponsible
personResponsible.description: Person(s) responsible for the collection (Lastname, Firstname; Lastname, Firstname).
personResponsible.title: Person responsible

taxonomicCoverage.subject: MY.taxonomicCoverage
taxonomicCoverage.description: Lowest common taxon in the collection (for example, scientific name of an order).
taxonomicCoverage.title: Taxonomic coverage
